item.title: Sophias Task Report
item.description: Introduction Give a brief overview about the content and intented outcome of this task. Finsih this overview with a clearly adressed research question. Data and Methods Give a brief overview about the data and methods you are using Results Describe your results with respect to the choosen Approach and with respect to the leading question Discussion Take your research question and your results and discuss the results with respect to your approach
